First.Title: International system and automation company
First.Explaine: IRISA (International Systems Engineering & Automation Company­)    Developer  2008­- 2011 I was part of a team developing management systems to implement management techniques and metrics to assist the company in making strategic decisions. I worked to different projects by different technology and I had to develop my skills and abilities to satisfy my customers and my company, so I learned varied technologies, tools, and frameworks and models like, MVC, when was high-tech in Information technology World.

Second.Title: MSC - Mobarakeeh steel company
Second.Explaine: 2011-Present Provide consulting and designing and implementing applications and test, based on two benchmark resources (framework, standard and model) called: "Develop vision and strategy" process group in APQC(American Productivity & quality Center- Process classification framework) and EA (Enterprise Architect framework) include several module as: Strategy planning based on BSC model (Balanced Scorecard), stakeholder management, Business process management, Corrective Actions and Project portfolio management, Change management, Risk Management, Evolution systems (ISO-EFQM), provide analysis environment and dashboards of KPI'S and Data Mining by Business Intelligence, knowledge management,... To achieve strategy decision of an organization and continuous Improvement, organizational Improvement, Process and Performance Management, Business Process Reengineering (BPR).
